attributes.action: Britain should offer asylum to Asia Bibi
attributes.additional_details: Asia Bibi has been imprisoned and persecuted for a long time in Pakistan due to her standing as Christian. Recently released she and her family are looking for asylum,and what better place than Britain a country with long held Christian values. If we can offer people of all other cults and religions sanctuary here surely this is an outstanding case to be approved.
attributes.background: Asia Bibi has been imprisoned and persecuted for a long time in Pakistan due to her standing as Christian. Recently released she and her family are looking for asylum,and what better place than Britain a country with long held Christian values.
